Text: During the English reformation a number of men were executed at Lancaster in England as a consequence of their Catholic faith.

<Text: Lancaster Martyrs:  They are commonly referred to as the Lancaster Martyrs and are commemorated locally by the Lancaster Martyrs Memorial Stone which may be found close to the centre of Lancaster city.>
Triplets:<Lancaster Martyrs
